text: "You're My Better Half" is a 2004 song by country singer Keith Urban and is the second single from his fourth studio album Be Here. It went to number 33 in the United States and number 34 in Australia. It also went to number 2 on the country single charts in the United States and Canada. ==References== Category:2004 songs Category:Country songs Category:Keith Urban songs Category:Music videos directed by Trey Fanjoy
title: You're My Better Half
